features: Lift yourself up: When the desk life gets you down, lift yourself up with Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse - a great fit for small to medium right hands
Raise your hand into comfort: Rest on Lift upright mouse throughout the day, with a softly textured grip and snug thumb rest for level-above cosiness, 10-m wireless range
57 degrees of sooooothe: Lift’s vertical shape helps wrists feel like “ahhh” at work, and promotes a more natural posture in the forearm, for day-long comfort and productivity
Relax into focus: Settle into work with a cordless mouse featuring easy-to-reach customisable buttons, whisper-quiet clicks and a SmartWheel for smooth, seamless scrolling
Ergo-certified: Lift wireless vertical mouse has been designed, developed, tested and approved according to criteria set out by leading ergonomists
Connect your way: Connect via Bluetooth Low Energy or Logi Bolt USB to Windows, macOS, iPadOS, Chrome OS, or Linux, and enjoy up to 2 years battery life
Plastic parts in Lift include certified post consumer recycled plastic (Graphite: 70%, Off-White and Rose: 54%(6)). Certified carbon neutral.
body.description: Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse Desk life getting you down? Lift yourself up with Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse – a comfy and intuitive wireless mouse with quiet clicks crafted specially for small to medium hands. Available in right and left. Lift’s unique 57-degree angle elevates your wrist to give a feeling of relief — and sends a wave of comfort through the forearm and upper body. Scrolling feels second nature with SmartWheel, which easily shifts from precision to speed-scroll. Customise Lift ergo mouse using intuitive Logi Options+ Software. Easily assign each of the 4 easy-to-reach customisable buttons to a handy shortcut – programme them to change as you hop between apps.* Connect with up to 3 devices, and Easy-Switch between them at the click of a button. With Logitech Flow you can breeze across screens, transferring any file you need with a simple copy and paste.* Lift is multi-OS compatible (Windows, macOS, iPadOS, Chrome OS**, Linux**) and built for comfort - with two years battery life packed into a single AA***. *Requires Logi Options+ software, available for Windows and macOS. **The device's basic functions will be supported without additional drivers for operating systems other than Windows and macOS. ***Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions. Product Details: Weight: 125 g Dimensions: 108 x 70 x 71 mm Tracking: 4000 DPI (fully adjustable DPI) Battery type: 1x AA battery Battery life: 24 months*** Wireless range: 10 m Connectivity: Bluetooth Low Energy or Logi Bolt USB receiver Platform compatibility: Windows 10, 11 or later, macOS 10.15 or later, iPadOS 14 or later, Chrome OS, Linux, Android 8.0 or later**

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VERTICAL IS THE NEW PINK You heard it from us first. That’s because a vertical mouse like Lift can launch your comfort at the computer sky high. RAISE YOUR HAND INTO COMFORT Desk days feel delightful up in “natural handshake position.” Let your hand unwind there as you work, snuggled on a swirled textured grip and cozy thumb rest. CURVE-TO-CURVE CALM Lift’s organic silhouette fits your palm like a glove - with a curved shape sculpted by Logitech’s team of ergonomic and design experts.

57° OF SOOOOOTHE 57° is where it’s at. This unique angle elevates your wrist to relieve pressure and align your forearm comfortably - making all the difference during and after a day at the desk. REALIGN INTO OUCH!-LESS WORK HOURS By placing your forearm and upper body in a more natural, relaxed posture, Lift makes long days at work feel less like a strain and more like a love story. RELAX INTO FOCUS ALL DAY LONG Less muscle strain in the arm. More productivity features at your fingertips. Quiet as a whisper, Lift helps drive your headspace away from distractions and onto the things that matter.

SAIL THROUGH WITH SMARTWHEEL With speed and precision scrolling modes, Lift’s SmartWheel makes work a smooth sail whether you’re editing line by line or flying through documents. WORK YOUR OWN WAY Customize Lift’s 4 buttons to your favorite shortcuts using intuitive Logi Options+ Software. You can even change the settings for different apps.* FLOW ACROSS DEVICES Connect Lift to up to 3 multi-OS devices, whether you use a computer or a tablet. Move files between devices using Logitech Flow technology.* TWO EASY WAYS TO CONNECT Choose between using Bluetooth Low Energy or the included Logi Bolt USB receiver, which is ideal for congested environments.

Previous page MEASURE YOUR HAND HERE Lift is a great fit for small- to medium-sized hands. Try MX Vertical if your hands are larger. CHOOSE THE RIGHT MOUSE FOR YOUR HAND Lift has been designed, crafted, and tested for small- to medium-sized hands. COMFORT COMES IN LEFT, TOO Lift Left Vertical Ergonomic Mouse is available in Graphite for left-handed users. Next page 1 MEASURE YOUR HAND HERE 2 SMALL, MEDIUM OR LARGE? 3 AVAILABLE IN LEFT
FIND OUT WHAT LUCY THINKS HEAR FUNSO’S THOUGHTS HEAR ELIN’S FIRST IMPRESSIONS

ENHANCE YOUR COMFORT AND PERFORMANCE The minimalist size of MX Keys Mini aligns your shoulders and allows you to place your mouse closer to your keyboard. That means less hand reaching, better posture, and improved ergonomics. LEARN MORE MIX AND MATCH COMFORT AND STYLE Pair Lift with the ultra-thin, modern, and versatile K380 multi-device keyboard. A tight form factor leaves plenty of room for comfy working. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse - Ideal for Office Comfort
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse has proven to be a game-changer for my office setup. Its unique vertical design offers a comfortable and natural grip, reducing strain on my wrist and forearm during extended work hours.Design (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):The ergonomic design of the Logitech Lift is its standout feature. The vertical orientation promotes a more natural hand position, preventing the discomfort often associated with traditional mice. The textured surface provides a secure grip, and the overall build quality is excellent.Performance (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):Navigating through documents and web pages is a breeze with the Logitech Lift. The responsive buttons and scroll wheel, coupled with precise tracking, contribute to a seamless and efficient user experience. It quickly became an indispensable tool in my daily workflow.Comfort (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):Comfort is where the Logitech Lift truly shines. The vertical orientation reduces the strain on my wrist, and I've noticed a significant decrease in discomfort associated with prolonged mouse use. It's a game-changer for anyone who spends long hours working at a computer.Ease of Use (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):Setting up the Logitech Lift was a straightforward process. It's compatible with various operating systems, and the plug-and-play functionality means you can start using it right away without any hassle. The customizable buttons add an extra layer of convenience.Overall, the Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse is a fantastic addition to any office setup. If you're looking to enhance comfort and reduce wrist strain during your workday, this mouse is a must-have. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks weird, works great
reviews.reviewText: Look, I know this mouse looks weird as hell. It does. However, I find it to be probably one of the most comfortable mice I've ever used, and definitely the easiest ergonomic mouse to use. Does anyone else remember those awful ball-type mice where you moved the ball with your thumb?? No thank you.I have not had any difficulties with my hand falling off, although I do have to remind myself to kind of "spread out" my fingers, as it were, so that I have the weight of my fingers evenly distributed. I did not find it hard to transition to using the new position for the forward/backward buttons, but sometimes it takes me a split second to get at the middle click, as well as to click without also scrolling; I think this will go away over time. I find the height to work well with my hand, and my long fingers do just fine (I wear a size M disposable glove, if you want to compare your hand against mine). I can use it with my mouse pad with the gel wrist rest without issue.I notice that Amazon wants a start ranking for gaming, but I don't think I would want to use this for gaming. Not that you couldn't... I just feel like the precision that I want for that purpose would be harder to get with this type of mouse? Not that you couldn't get there, I think, with some practice. The response time for this mouse is no worse than my traditional-style Logitec M510.One advantage to having a weird-looking mouse: no one will ever steal it from you, especially if you get it in a weird color (not that the pink isn't nice; it's a very pretty pastel pink, and true to how it looks on my screen).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse, easy on my hand
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mouse. It's easy on my hand and I like the soft click. The description says that it's for small to medium hands but I wear large men's gloves and I find it to be a perfect size. It's smaller size allows me to pack it in the lap top bag. It's powered by a battery so if you are used to a chargeable unit, that might be a pain for you. But thus far, it has not been a problem for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big hand comfy, great bluetooth connectivity and toggle
reviews.reviewText: I have big hands and have trouble with some mouses. This feels comfortable for my big mitts, and has great toggle switching between different laptops in my office. It's not too big, and not too small. It's also not too horizontal to where i'm feeling like i'm flying a jet plane (i don't know how to describe this), it's just a well thought out mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better ergonomic mouse for smaller hands
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I'm very happy with this mouse.I'm a CAD drafter, and have been using a standard gaming mouse for many years. I'm beginning to develop hand and wrist pain and tried one of Logitech's other ergonomic options about two years ago and found it was too large for my hands. When I found out about this smaller version I decided to give it a try, and I'm glad I did. It seems to be helping with the wrist pain specifically, and was very easy to transition to this style. I read several other reviews that said it doesn't have Bluetooth, but they must be reviewing some other product because this one definitely has Bluetooth, and it works very well. I've had no issues whatsoever with connectivity. It is very quiet, too, so if you're noise-senstive this one is probably a good choice for you. I can barely hear the clicks. If you go on the Logitech website and look up this mouse, you'll see a link to the software that you can download to customize the programmable buttons, and to choose your specific preferences for how the mouse works. I can't comment yet on longevity or battery life, because I've only been using it for about two weeks. I do wish it had more programmable buttons, but I suppose I've been spoiled by using a gaming mouse for so long. For most people two programmable buttons is probably plenty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mouse to help with my wrist and it hasn't disappoint. The mouse keeps my wrist on the side and my wrist doesn't feel stiff like before. The mouse is responsive and perfect for work. I did try to use it in gaming but it's not the best for gaming but if you're in a pinch it'll do.The mouse isn't too bulky and it is easy to set up on bluetooth.

The media could not be loaded. 100% silencioso. Eu estava sentindo muitas dores na mão devido meu mouse anterior (normal), toda vez que eu tocava no mouse antigo, minha mão doida muito. Resolvi fazer esse investimento e a melhoria é notável. Estou usando o mouse a 1 hora e as dores já aliviaram relativamente. Eu nunca faço review dos produtos aqui na amazon, mas esse tive que vir fazer, porque eu estou muito feliz que minha mão está parando de doer.Eu uso um MacBook, o mouse se conectou no mac em menos de 3 segundos e já estava pronto para uso.Os botões auxiliares do mouse estão funcionando perfeitamente.A minha mão é bem grande, e eu achei o tamanho do mouse ideal.Já veio com pilha.O Mouse veio lacrado perfeitamenteMelhor compra da minha vida.

reviews.reviewTitle: El mouse mas comodo que he tenido
reviews.reviewText: Definitivamente lo volveria a comprar. Es bastante comodo, sobre todo para uso prolongado. Lo uso para mi trabajo de oficina. Es bastante silencioso (casi no se esuchan los clics). En cuanto lo prendi la computadora lo detecto via Bluetooth y la conexion fue muy sencilla. Vale cada centavo.
Ajudou nas dores nos braço mas exige um tempo para adaptação. É conveniente notar que não é ambidestro.

Pros:- very comfortable to hold- quiet clicks- programmable thumb buttons and middle click button- smooth scroll wheel- Bluetooth and USB connectivity- can switch between 3 connected devices- magnetic battery coverCons:- bulky for carrying between rooms or to/from the office- a bit priceyI have small hands and this fits me perfectly. This is a high quality mouse that is worth the price.

Impressionante como fica confortável utilizar um mouse nesse formato. Somado a isso o fato da qualidade construtiva e da sensibilidade dos botões que são muito leves e fáceis de apertar, sem barulho de clique e com um wheel super macio. Ainda é válido destacar a facilidade de pareamento, aonde ao clicar no botão em baixo, se o notebook estiver próximo, já aparece um pop up perguntando se deseja parear. O procedimento demora segundos e o mouse está pronto para uso. Funcionou muito bem no iPad. Cara, o mouse é perfeito. Pode comprar.
